companies.name: Yulife
companies.description: UK-based employee benefits platform offering group life insurance, critical illness cover, and YuMatter EAP with mental health counselling and financial/legal advice.

companies.name: Spectrum.Life
companies.description: Irish digital health platform providing 24/7 EAP, mental health support, and integrated wellbeing solutions across UK, EU, and international markets.

companies.name: Health Assured
companies.description: UK and Ireland's largest EAP provider supporting 12.5+ million lives with 24/7 helpline, mobile app, and comprehensive employee assistance services.

companies.name: Sonder
companies.description: UK EAP provider offering 24/7 personal safety, medical, and mental health support with journey tracking and crisis intervention for 1+ million members.

companies.name: Spill
companies.description: Highly-rated UK EAP service providing immediate access to qualified therapists, legal advice, and financial counselling with near-perfect Trustpilot ratings.

companies.name: Vivup
companies.description: UK-based benefits platform specializing in EAP for public sector (NHS, local authorities, education) with 24/7 clinically accredited counselling services.

companies.name: Perkbox
companies.description: Global employee benefits platform offering EAP alongside wellness, perks, and engagement tools, serving teams across UK and EU markets.

companies.name: LifeWorks
companies.description: TELUS Health mental health and EAP provider delivering clinical expertise, counselling, and financial/legal support across UK and EU regions.

companies.name: Headspace
companies.description: Global mental health platform offering EAP replacement solutions with therapy, mindfulness, critical incident support, and work-life services for organizations.

companies.name: Wellhub
companies.description: Leading corporate wellness platform providing fitness, mental health coaching (via Headspace), therapy, and nutrition benefits across UK, EU, and globally.
